body:
Hello, some of you may remember something about an Avicus Maps Page. So far, it seems progression with it has been relatively slow so I did what I could to speed up the process by having a picture for each map. I believe I have every single DTM map and I will continue with the other gamemodes too if needed. 

It took a while to do all this so i hope it pays off :p

If you are going to contribute to this as well, I suggest you take screenshots with the Plast Pack as it is makes blocks look brighter and cleaner. 

So here is all the DTM maps currently in the rotations.
*Please tell me if I missed some.

Click here --> Album Link

This is the order that I took the pictures in and it should match up with the Imgur album.
body_tagged:

title: [WEB] I Have Map Page Pictures.

replies.body: Maybe make a google doc? It would make it more organized.
replies.body_tagged: Maybe make a google doc? It would make it more organized.

replies.body: I'm not sure how the Maps Page works so I don't know if I should because it might be a waste of time. For example, I don't know whether you can upload a map picture to the page by link or if you can only upload from your computer etc..
replies.body_tagged: I'm not sure how the Maps Page works so I don't know if I should because it might be a waste of time. For example, I don't know whether you can upload a map picture to the page by link or if you can only upload from your computer etc..

reply_to.body: Maybe make a google doc? It would make it more organized.

replies.body: But seriously, thanks for this, I'll make sure to add this when my github is fixed! c:

You, sir, have no life!

Thanks for helping improve Avicus!

replies.body: Thanks for this Poker Face!  Could you do this for other game modes when you have the time because this looked like it took a lot of work. (For the map devs I recognized the ME3 maps were moved to their game modes but mine wasn't :0 no big deal, just letting you know

replies.body:
Hi, so I don't know why nobody looked at jracer15's 300x200 pictures of mine. Was it because it has to be from Imgur or something? Regardless, I have changed all the pictures to 300x200 on Imgur so here is the new album. The post has been updated as well.

http://imgur.com/a/VwE3s/all
